name: Sticks and Stones (Masterttt123)
description:
This game was made in 6 days by one person (me) for the Void Jam 2.0 "Out of Time".

An existential threat approaches, but our beloved king can´t be dealing with that when his bubble bath has just warmed up, so he's tasked you to get the Biggest Stick in the land and just whack all your problems away.

There's a time limit of 1 hour 20 minutes to beat this game that persists between prestiges, so you'd better hurry up!

Some features ended up unfinished, and others were severely neutered due to lack of time. In the future I plan to come back and reinsert all the missing features i had planned. Feel free to give any feedback, but keep this in mind.

I hope you like my game, this was my first time participating in a game jam.
